tech.name: HTML
tech.description: HTML is the most basic building block of the Web. It defines the meaning and structure of web content.

tech.name: CSS
tech.description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a stylesheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML.

tech.name: Javascript
tech.description: Javascript is a lightweight interpreted programming language, prototype-based, single-threaded, dynamic language.

tech.name: Vue
tech.description: Vue is a JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It builds on top of standard HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

tech.name: Nuxt
tech.description: Nuxt is a framework with an intuitive and extendable way to create full-stack web applications and websites with Vue.js.

tech.name: Astro
tech.description: Astro is best-known for pioneering a new frontend architecture to reduce JavaScript overhead and complexity.

tech.name: Tailwind
tech.description: Tailwind is a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building modern websites without ever leaving your HTML.

tech.name: Sass
tech.description: Sass is a stylesheet language thatâ€™s compiled to CSS.

tech.name: Github
tech.description: Github is a cloud platform where you can store and work together with others to write code.

tech.name: Figma
tech.description: Figma is a powerful, collaborative design tool for teams.

tech.name: npm
tech.description: npm is the world's largest software registry, a large public database of JavaScript software.

tech.name: Wordpress
tech.description: Wordpress (WP, or WordPress.org) is a web content management system. Written in the PHP programming language.
